title: Cisco's Data Structures
statement: Cisco Ramon is organizing interdimensional data. He has an array of N integers and needs to find the longest subsequence where each element is greater than the previous one. Help him find the length of the longest increasing subsequence.
input: The first line contains an integer N (1 ≤ N ≤ 1000). The second line contains N integers a₁, a₂, ..., aₙ (1 ≤ aᵢ ≤ 10⁹).
output: Print the length of the longest increasing subsequence.
